title: Data Centre Engineer
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish. Do you wish to be challenged to think creatively? The people here at Apple don’t just craft products - they build the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that inspires the innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it! The Data Center Operations group is looking for a Data Center Engineer. The successful candidate will be responsible for deploying and maintaining servers, networking equipment and other devices together with installing and supporting fibre and copper infrastructure in our Data Centers located in Japan and South Korea. In this role you will focus on developing and sustaining solutions through communication and coordination with Apple Data Center teams and Business Groups to help deliver a solid infrastructure and services to meet global business objectives. We seek a self-starter, visionary team player with strong infrastructure cabling capabilities to drive standards as well as innovative methodologies to achieve these objectives.
description: In this role, you will be responsible for a wide range of tasks related to the deployment and maintenance of compute servers and network infrastructure in our data center environments in Japan and South Korea. Your duties will encompass cabling infrastructure and Data Center Infrastructure Management (DCIM) elements. Your responsibilities will include performing cable installations, hardware installations, as well as testing and troubleshooting using standard data center processes. You'll be expected to physically assist in moving and racking equipment, and support the deployment of on-site data center physical infrastructure, including servers, network switches, and storage devices. Vendor management will be a part of your role, ensuring compliance with technical specifications and quality standards. You'll also assist the data center inventory and asset...
preferred_qualifications: Technical certifications preferred (e.g. CompTIA,, BICSI, CNet, IDCA qualifications) or related experience. Self-motivated and the ability to take direction with minimal supervision and capable of independent problem solving. Strong communicator at all levels with excellent oral and written skills to a variety of audiences. Willingness to occasionally travel within and outside of Japan and provide on call / out of business hours to respond to and resolve urgent business issues. Proven ability to manage key stakeholder interests while at the same time managing conflicting priorities and business interests. Knowledge of safety procedures, established techniques, and equipment. Japanese (preferably JLPT N2 or above) would also be a bonus.
